EmailTemplate.description: Reminding partners to complete survey for swag
EmailTemplate.name: REMINDER- 1st Deal BlueWave Bonus
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: You've earned a BlueWave Bonus.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder: The solar loan you closed for a customer means that you've earned Patagonia gear from BlueWave.
Please complete the survey below so we know what to send and where to send it!
How to Cash In: Let us know how we’re doing by filling out this brief survey.
Once you’ve filled out the survey, you’ll have the option to select which bag you want us to send your way.
What's Next? After your 5th deal we will send your next BlueWave Bonus of a $100 Visa Gift Card!
Thanks for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere.
- All of us here at BlueWave
General Partner Support 888-817-2703 PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com Partner Support is available 8AM - 8PM EST
